/wiki/Carlos_Flores_(footballer): Carlos "Kukín" Flores Murillo (August 4, 1974 – February 17, 2019) was a Peruvian Footballer who played for several Clubs.
/wiki/Association_football: Association football, more commonly known as football or soccer,[a] is a team sport played with a spherical ball between two teams of 11 players. It is played by approximately 250 million players in over 200 countries and dependencies, making it the world's most popular sport. The game is played on a rectangular field called a pitch with a goal at each end. The object of the game is to score by moving the ball beyond the goal line into the opposing goal.
/wiki/Leysi_Su\u00e1rez: Leysi Suárez Zamudio (born September 22, 1980) is a Peruvian dancer, actress and vedette.
/wiki/Vedette_(cabaret): A vedette is the main female artist of a show derived from cabaret and its genres (revue, vaudeville, music hall or burlesque).
/wiki/Mario_Hart: Season one of the 2011 edition of El Gran Show premiered on April 14, 2011.
/wiki/Race_car_driver: Auto racing (also known as car racing, motor racing, or automobile racing) is a motorsport involving the racing of automobiles for competition.
/wiki/Aldo_Miyashiro: Aldo Miyashiro Ribeiro (born 1976) is a Japanese Peruvian playwright, screenwriter and actor. His play Misterio was adapted into a TV miniseries.
/wiki/Vanessa_Terkes: Vanessa Cvujetka Terkes Rachitoff, (born March 3, 1978) is a Peruvian film, television and stage actress. She is best known for her role in the Mexican television series El Pantera, as Lola.
/wiki/Leslie_Shaw: Leslie Ann Shaw Thays (b. Lima, 27 February 1989) formerly musically known as Shaw is a Peruvian model, singer, dancer and actress. She is best known for representing Peru in the Viña del Mar International Song Festival and being the Runner-up on the first season of El Gran Show 2011.
/wiki/Ra\u00fal_Zuazo: Season one of the 2011 edition of El Gran Show premiered on April 14, 2011.
/wiki/El_Gran_Show_(season_1_of_2011): Season one of the 2011 edition of El Gran Show premiered on April 14, 2011.
